=================================================
 
Michael Mosley takes an informative and ambitious journey exploring how the evolution of scientific understanding is intimately interwoven with society's historical path

 
 

1/6 How we came to understand our planet was not at the centre of everything in the cosmos

2/6 How atomic theories and concepts of quantum physics underpin modern technology.

3/6 Michael Mosley tells how scientists came to explain the diversity of life on earth.

4/6 The story of how power has been harnessed from wind, steam and from inside the atom.

5/6 The story of how the secret of life has been examined through the prism of the human body.
 
6/6 The sciences of brain anatomy and psychology have offered different visions of who we are.
